# Get All Resource IDs of Individual Testers for a Build

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get a list of resource IDs of individual testers associated with a build.

## Listing Individually Assigned Beta Testers

- **List All Individual Testers for a Build**: Get a list of beta testers individually assigned to a build.

items.description: Get a list of beta testers individually assigned to a build.
